directions: Combine in slow cooker: evaporated milk, paprika, salt, egg, butter and cheese; stir. Cook on high for 1 hour.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Stir cooked macaroni into cheese sauce, reduce temperature to low and cook for 3 to 5 hours.
title: Slow Cooker Macaroni and Cheese II
